title: appanE
sahitya:
appanE kapAli ennai ANDaruL karpakavallI maruvum

anupallavi
 
ceppa nAn taramA nin perumai arpanEn arivEnO unadarumai

caraNam
 
mA maruvuru tirumaru kARmaNi mADa mayilai mAnagar urai nirai azhagA
kuzhagA shenkaN mAlODayan arivaru perumAnE paramAnanda mA kavi
kunjaradAsanEn unaiyE nambinEn
